title: (Namo) Devi Durga Janani
title2: (Namo) Devi Durga Janani Devi Amba Bhavani
lyrics:
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma
Jaya Karunamayi Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Ma [ Devi Durga ... ]
Deva Sambhuta Shakthi Swaroopini
Abhayankari Devi Narayani
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Sai Ma
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Sai Ma
meaning: I pray to Mother Durga, the Divine Mother. She is Mother Ambe, born out of the flame that emanated from the bodies of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. She is full of compassion and gives us courage, protection and joy. I sing to You, O Divine Mother, and praise Your Supreme Power and Form in Mother Sai.

title: A crown of hair
title2: A crown of hair, an orange robe
lyrics:
Loving eyes, a heart of gold
He floats to us across the sand
Sacred ash pours from His hand
Millions call Him living Lord, a living Lord is He
Millions wave with tearful eyes, tearful eyes with joy inside
A million hearts in sweet devotion filled with the love of the Lord
meaning: This beautiful devotional song describes the Lord arriving with loving eyes and a heart of gold, pouring sacred ash from His hand. Millions of devotees call Him the living Lord with tearful eyes of joy and hearts filled with sweet devotion.
